DOC.brief_title: Pre-operative Polysomnography Assessment Cardiac Surgery Inpatients
DOC.criteria: Subjects undergo major cardiovascular surgery ( coronary artery bypass graft , valve replacement surgery , aortic surgery ) general anesthesia . Subjects surgery plan great 1 day less 60 day time enrollment . Subjects treat sleep apnea positive airway pressure ( PAP ) therapy oral appliance past 30 day . Subjects undergo Maze procedure atrial fibrillation . Subjects unable comply study procedure .
